caption:
After weeks of bombardment from the Houthis in Yemen, the IDF said enough is enough and has now taken off the gloves. 

Israel has confirmed that it launched widespread attacks across Yemen in response to the Houthi’s terror. 

This is the beginning of an ongoing campaign to stop the firing of drones and ballistic missiles into Israel. 

So far, the results of Israel’s attack in Yemen:
 
1. Sana’a Airport – Completely shut down.
2. Power Plants in Sana’a – Destroyed.
3. Hodeidah Seaport – Shut down once again.

This is all happening during the press conference of the Houthi leader.

Attacks at the airport include the control tower, planes, and runways, were attacked, resulting in several casualties. 

Israel is expecting the Houthis to intensify their attacks now on Israel but the Israeli leadership said this is the beginning of a long operation. 

Is this the beginning of the end of the Houthi’s? Let’s hope so.
